Description of incident: "What Happened.  On Friday, February 3, 2017, we were notified that the content of our PoliceOne Forum was the subject of unauthorized access and acquisition. The incident occurred in our forums, which are run on third party software and are entirely separate from our main PoliceOne member database and other systems, which have not been compromised. We have become aware of a security incident in our PoliceOne Forums that allegedly occurred in 2015. We are aggressively addressing the matter and want to make you clear on the scope of the issue and its potential impact to you. Security is incredibly important to us and we've worked hard to protect your information over the past 17 years.What Information Was Involved.  The information accessed was limited, and included email addresses, user names and hashed and salted passwords (a protected version of the password you use). It did not include forums posts or other content."More Information: https://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-67050
